current_state: High key-person dependency risks in DevOps, QA, and security-critical backend tasks.
recommended_action: Formalize a pair programming schedule: Senior Backend pairs with Mid Backend on Lambda/Security. Senior Frontend pairs with Mid Frontend on Offline Sync/A11y. Backend devs to pair with DevOps on Terraform scripting.
expected_benefit: Reduces single-point-of-failure risk by 40%. Increases team velocity in later sprints by improving bus factor.
success_metrics: At least two team members can confidently review and modify code in each critical area.
roi_calculation: Avoids potential 2-3 week delay from a key person's absence, saving an estimated $30,000 in project costs.

current_state: Frontend development is blocked by backend API availability for data persistence features.
recommended_action: Mandate the use of Mock Service Worker (MSW) for all frontend tasks with backend dependencies. API contracts must be defined in OpenAPI and committed to the repo before any implementation begins.
expected_benefit: Allows frontend and backend teams to work in parallel, decoupling sprint schedules and shortening the critical path by an estimated 10-15%.
success_metrics: Frontend E2E tests for features like 'Persistent History' are passing against mocked APIs before the backend is deployed.
roi_calculation: Accelerates timeline by at least 1 week, providing significant time-to-market value.
